name: The Ultimate Nerd Game
description:
In The Ultimate Nerd Game, you are given simple, basic pieces for circuit building. Assemble them together to create intricate machines of stunning complexity. In this first person logic sandbox, the only limit is your imagination.

If you like TUNG, check out the community on reddit and discord. If you'd like to get notified when there's a new update, sign up for the email list.

The Ultimate Nerd Game
A game from Mouse Hat Games
Programming & Game Design by Jimmy Cushnie
Sound Design by Emmanuel Lagumbay
Title art by Daniel John
Additional graphic design by Ben Longley
Quality Assurance: Ben Longley & Daniel John

If you'd like to contact me, please send me an email: jimmycushnie@gmail.com

The project is currently in the alpha stage of development. While in alpha, TUNG is completely free. All alpha versions will be free forever, but beta versions and forward will cost money.

Older versions of TUNG can be downloaded here.
